definition: to flow out swiftly/to flood/a torrent/diarrhea/laxative

sentences.english: The barrier-lagoons belong to marine regression type.
sentences.chinese: 本區的沙壩瀉湖屬於海退型。

sentences.english: The 100 over-water bungalows perch on stilts above the turquoise lagoon.
sentences.chinese: 在100個水平房鱸魚上方的綠松石瀉湖高蹺。

sentences.english: The Blue Lagoon is a mineral-rich seawater lake heated by lava.
sentences.chinese: 藍瀉湖是一個由火山熔岩形成的鹹水湖，富含礦物質。

sentences.english: There are many bay-drowned-valley tidal inlets and Sandbar-lagoon tidal inlets in Hainan island.
sentences.chinese: 海南島存在着大量港灣溺谷型和砂壩瀉湖型潮汐汊道。

sentences.english: The application of ceramic membranes in the pretreatment of seawater desalinization;
sentences.chinese: 主要煤層含硫低與該區瀉湖及表層海水淡化有關。

sentences.english: A bottlenose dolphin plays in a lagoon in Waimanalo, Hawaii.
sentences.chinese: 寬吻海豚的遊戲在馬納洛瀉湖，夏威夷。

sentences.english: Japan is filling in lagoons to create more land to build upon.
sentences.chinese: 日本正在填充瀉湖，希望形成更多的土地。

sentences.english: The Blue Lagoon is a mineral-rich seawater lake heated by lava2.
sentences.chinese: 藍瀉湖是一個由火山熔岩形成的鹹水湖，富含礦物質。

sentences.english: The latter resulted from the deposition of dark and organic-rich material in the back reef and the lagoon.
sentences.chinese: 後者爲礁後瀉湖相黑色富有機質岩層，厚度較薄。

sentences.english: The beauty of the lagoon is unparalleled.
sentences.chinese: 美麗的瀉湖是無與倫比的。

sentences.english: It is right in the middle of a dark blue 17)lagoon that just is going to be heart-stopping once you see it.
sentences.chinese: 它位於深藍色的瀉湖中央，那種美看了讓人屏息。

sentences.english: It has been living in the Venetian lagoon on the car.
sentences.chinese: 它一直是居住在瀉湖上的威尼斯人代步的工具。

sentences.english: A bottlenose dolphin plays in a lagoon in Waimanalo, Hawaii.
sentences.chinese: 一隻寬吻海豚在夏威夷威瑪納諾的瀉湖裏嬉戲。

sentences.english: Venice and its lagoon joined the World Heritage List in 1987.
sentences.chinese: 威尼斯城及其瀉湖1987年被列入世界遺產名錄。

sentences.english: The most likely manure storage facilities to meet the current reporting requirements are anaerobic lagoons.
sentences.chinese: 最可能滿足目前審報要求的糞便貯存設施就是瀉湖。
瀉湖這個“分水嶺”是由砂質物構成的。

definition: lagoon/erroneously written 瀉湖|泻湖[xie4 hu2]
shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep
